parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True to use the document setting for the diameter of the circle for the arrow of the base ordinate dimension, false to use the diameter of the circle for the arrow of the base ordinate dimension set by IDisplayDimension::SetOrdinateDimensionArrowSize if the base ordinate dimension standard is set to DIN

parameters.name: ArrowSize
parameters.description: Diameter of the circle for the arrow of the base ordinate dimension

title: IDisplayDimension.GetOrdinateDimensionArrowSize
description: Gets the diameter of the circle for the arrow of the base ordinate dimension.
signature:
void GetOrdinateDimensionArrowSize( 
   out System.Boolean
UseDoc
,
   out System.Double
ArrowSize
)

parameters.name: UseDoc
parameters.description: True to use the document setting for the diameter of the circle for the arrow of the base ordinate dimension, false to use the diameter of the circle for the arrow of the base ordinate dimension set by IDisplayDimension::SetOrdinateDimensionArrowSize if the base ordinate dimension standard is set to DIN

parameters.name: ArrowSize
parameters.description: Diameter of the circle for the arrow of the base ordinate dimension
